metadata.title: CVE-2021-47359 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: cifs:Fix soft lockup during fsstress Below traces are observed during fsstressand system got hung. [ 130.698396] watchdog: BUG: soft lockup - CPU#6 stuckfor 26s!

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
